title: Advise on a 1031 Exchange
description: An investor is selling a property and wants to perform a 1031 exchange to defer capital gains taxes. Their agent must guide them on the process.

tasks.description: Explain the strict timelines of a 1031 exchange (45 days to identify a replacement property, 180 days to close).
tasks.expected_outcome: The client understands the critical deadlines.

tasks.description: Refer the client to a qualified intermediary (QI) who is legally required to facilitate the exchange.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is connected with a QI.

tasks.description: Begin searching for suitable replacement properties that meet the exchange criteria before the sale of the original property closes.
tasks.expected_outcome: A proactive search for replacement properties is initiated.
